OKAY!! :) 

Sandy,
     If you notice I had Dark Rodimus attempt to hit Tuscon and I posted his intent and left it up to you as to whether it connected and what happened, however you did not return the favor. 

Tuscon caught his fist, and clamped his hand (which was okay), then grappled him painfully and then after a few words through him against a wall, without giving me as Rodimus' player the chance to post wether he broke free of it or not, saying that that was only a bit of Tuscon's strength and that he was trying not to hurt Rodimus. 

Please don't assume that shots hit, or that attacks have the affect. Remember, Tuscon is fighting an Ex Prime, and he is still Dark Rodimus and not Dark Hot Rod. Even Prime or Megatron couldn't throw Rodimus around like that when they're at full strength.

If you want to throw him around, then talk to me on list or off, and we can work something out. 

Again, I am not mad, but I want to keep it fair for all the characters involved. 

Preston
